message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $12,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but  $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying. I'd be willing to pay $9,500 for it. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still a bit out of my budget.  I'm  prepared to pay $10,500. It's a fair price considering the value of the product and my budget. Let's see if we can make this work!

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I've already compromised a bit from my initial price. I'm willing to meet you at $10,750, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. It's a fair price considering the value of the product and the effort I've put into it.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility.  $10,750 is very close, but I'm still a bit over budget.  I'm willing to pay $10,250. It's a fair price considering my budget and the value we've both agreed on for the product.  Let's make this deal work!

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I've already compromised a significant amount from my initial price. I'm willing to meet you at $10,500, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product and the effort I've put into it.
